00001 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00002 ! Subroutine : HydrodynamicsF
00003 ! Revision   : 1.0 (2008-06-15)

00005 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

00029 
00030  SUBROUTINE HydrodynamicsF
00031 
00032 ! Common Variables
00033  USE NTypes,      ONLY : DBL
00034  USE Domain,      ONLY : inv12, ni_f, xmax_f, xmin_f, ymax_f, ymin_f
00035  USE FluidParams, ONLY : beta4, gradRhoX_f, gradRhoY_f, kappa_6, psi_f, rho_f, rhoH, rhoL, rhoStar
00036  USE LBMParams,   ONLY : fbar
00037  IMPLICIT NONE
00038 
00039 ! Local Variables
00040  INTEGER :: i, j, ie, iw, jn, js
00041  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: lapRho_f
00042 
00043 
00044 !--------- Calculate the density in the order parameter mesh -------------------
00045  DO j = ymin_f, ymax_f
00046    DO i = xmin_f, xmax_f
00047      rho_f(i,j) = fbar(i,j,0) + fbar(i,j,1) + fbar(i,j,2) + fbar(i,j,3) &
00048                 + fbar(i,j,4) + fbar(i,j,5) + fbar(i,j,6) + fbar(i,j,7) &
00049                 + fbar(i,j,8)
00050    END DO
00051  END DO
00052 
00053 !---------- Differential terms in the order parameter mesh (stress formulation)
00054  DO j = ymin_f, ymax_f
00055    DO i = xmin_f, xmax_f
00056 
00057 ! Identify first neighbors
00058      ie = ni_f(i,j,1)
00059      jn = ni_f(i,j,2)
00060      iw = ni_f(i,j,3)
00061      js = ni_f(i,j,4)
00062 
00063 ! Gradient of the density rho
00064      gradRhoX_f(i,j) = ( 4.D0*( rho_f(ie,j ) - rho_f(iw,j ) ) + rho_f(ie,jn) &
00065                      - rho_f(iw,jn) + rho_f(ie,js) - rho_f(iw,js) )*inv12
00066 
00067      gradRhoY_f(i,j) = ( 4.D0*( rho_f(i ,jn) - rho_f(i ,js) ) + rho_f(ie,jn) &
00068                      - rho_f(ie,js) + rho_f(iw,jn) - rho_f(iw,js) )*inv12
00069 
00070 ! Laplacian of the density rho
00071      lapRho_f = 4.D0*( rho_f(ie,j ) + rho_f(iw,j ) + rho_f(i ,jn) + rho_f(i ,js) ) &
00072               +  rho_f(ie,jn) + rho_f(ie,js) + rho_f(iw,jn) + rho_f(iw,js)         &
00073               - 20.D0*rho_f(i,j)
00074 
00075 ! Define Psi
00076      psi_f(i,j) = beta4*( rho_f(i,j) - rhoStar )*( rho_f(i,j) - rhoL )*( rho_f(i,j) - rhoH ) &
00077                 - kappa_6*lapRho_f
00078 
00079    END DO
00080  END DO
00081 
00082  RETURN
00083  END SUBROUTINE HydrodynamicsF
